meanings.definition: A picture or design made with a pen, pencil, or other writing tool.
examples: It helps me to remember ideas when I make a drawing of them.

images.alt: Photo of a person using a pencil to create a design on paper.
images.description: A person using a pencil to create a design on paper.
images.caption: A person drawing a design on paper.

meanings.definition: A statue or other object made by carving, chiseling, or molding.
examples: She carves sculptures out of blocks of marble.

images.alt: Photo of a person carving a sculpture.
images.caption: A sculpture created by an artist.

source.title: Man in Black Crew Neck T-shirt Sitting Beside Man in Black T-shirt
source.author: Mushtaq Hussain

meanings.definition: A building where objects that are important to history, art, or science are kept and shown to the public.
examples: They enjoyed seeing the paintings and statues in the art museum.

images.alt: Photo of a glass pyramid and with a stone building in the background.
images.description: A glass pyramid and with a stone building in the background.
images.caption: An art museum in Paris, France.

source.title: Clear Glass Museum during Golden Hour
source.author: Pixabay

meanings.definition: A picture made with paint and used as decoration.
examples: We saw many beautiful paintings and sculptures at the art museum.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking at paintings in a museum.
images.description: A person sitting, facing three paintings on a wall in a museum.
images.caption: Three paintings on a wall in a museum.

source.title: Woman Sitting on Ottoman in Front of Three Paintings
source.author: Una Laurencic

meanings.definition: Things that are made by humans and that people think have beauty or deep meaning.
examples: Music, films, written works, and paintings are examples of art.

images.alt: Photo of a hall in a museum.
images.description: A hall in a museum. Paintings are on the walls.
images.caption: An art exhibit hall.
